hops.description: a JSON list of dicts, each specifying a node and the payload destined for that node

payload.description: payload to be sent to the node

assocdata.description: the associated data that the onion should commit to. If the onion is to be used to send a payment later it MUST match the `payment_hash` of the payment in order to be valid

session_key.description: can be used to specify a secret that is used to generate the shared secrets used to encrypt the onion for each hop. It should only be used for testing or if a specific shared secret is important. If not specified it will be securely generated internally, and the shared secrets will be returned

onion_size.description: a size different from the default payment onion (1300 bytes). May be used for custom protocols like trampoline routing
